      Returns the student's middle initial
      java.lang.String getSID()
      Returns the student's SID
      double getTotalDegreeCredits()
      Returns the student's total degree credits (credits from courses that have been completed with a passing grade)
      double getTotalQualityPoints()
      Returns the student's total quality points (determined by summing course credits multiplied by numeric course grade for all completed courses that do not have a recorded grade of Pass)

      Set the student's first name.

      • setMiddleInitial

        public void setMiddleInitial(java.lang.String theMiddleInitial)
                      throws StudentSpec.StudentSpecException
        Description copied from interface: StudentSpec
        Set the student's middle initial. If the supplied value is null or an empty string, the middle initial is set to an empty string; if the supplied value is a length of one or greater, the middle initial is set to the first character of the supplied string.
        Specified by:
        setMiddleInitial in interface StudentSpec
        Parameters:
        theMiddleInitial - - the new middle initial
        Throws:
        StudentSpec.StudentSpecException - if the supplied value is not valid

      • setGPAIngredients

        public void setGPAIngredients(double theTotalDegreeCredits,
                              double theTotalQualityPoints)
                       throws StudentSpec.StudentSpecException
        Description copied from interface: StudentSpec
        Set the student's total degree credits and total quality points. The supplied values must be non-negative, and when used to calculate GPA must produce a value between MIN_GPA and MAX_GPA.
        Specified by:
        setGPAIngredients in interface StudentSpec
        Parameters:
        theTotalDegreeCredits - =- the new total degree credits
        theTotalQualityPoints - - the new total quality points
        Throws:
        StudentSpec.StudentSpecException - if the supplied value is not valid
